title: Oz Could Be the First Muslim U.S. Senator, but Some Muslim Americans Are Ambivalent
description: Unlike most Americans of his faith, Dr. Mehmet Oz is a Republican. His distance from their communities and some of his comments about Islam have unnerved fellow Muslims.
dc:creator: Liam Stack
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Dr. Mehmet Oz could be the United Statesâ€™ first Muslim senator.
